description: This source file defines asynchronous functions for listing and retrieving 'Run' objects from a database using SQLAlchemy ORM. It includes functions to list recent runs with a limit and to get a specific run by ID.

methods.name: List[models.Run] list_runs(db: AsyncSession, limit: int = 100)
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves a list of the most recent 'Run' records from the database, limited by the 'limit' parameter.

methods.name: Optional[models.Run] get_run(db: AsyncSession, run_id: int)
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches a single 'Run' record by its ID, returning None if not found.

ctags.name: get_run
ctags.pattern: /^async def get_run(db: AsyncSession, run_id: int) -> Optional[models.Run]:$/

ctags.name: list_runs
ctags.pattern: /^async def list_runs(db: AsyncSession, limit: int = 100) -> List[models.Run]:$/
